pattern.violation: Cognitive offloading incomplete - human/Claude doing work that could be parallelized
pattern.recommendation: Implement parallel tool call patterns where independent operations (multiple Reads, Globs, or agent Tasks) can execute concurrently

raw_evidence.description: All 7 sessions with behaviors showed parallel=0 in execution_patterns. Even session 281ffece with 191 tool calls executed entirely sequentially despite having multiple independent file reads and agent invocations.
